segments.text: It's heartbreaking to watch this unfolding in the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so engrossed in her plate, unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water overflows the sink, ruining the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That puddle on the floor could cause a terrible slip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool looks so vulnerable up there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move and he'll tumble down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister reaches up, eyes full of innocent expectation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're breaking rules, but it's their small joy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window shows a serene garden outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, it's all potential disaster waiting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would notice and stop this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The dish towel in her hand seems so trivial now.
segments.speaker: PAR
